Title: Create Model-Driven App & Site Map
User Story: As a developer, I want a Model-Driven App created in the PowerOne solution with a configured site map, so that administrators have a dedicated interface for managing master data.

Title: Organizational Unit Management
User Story: As an admin, I want forms and views for managing organizational units in the Model-Driven App, so that the org hierarchy is maintained through a purpose-built admin interface.

Title: Sprint Management
User Story: As an admin, I want forms and views for managing sprints in the Model-Driven App, so that time periods are properly configured for OKR cycles.

Title: User-OrgUnit Assignment
User Story: As an admin, I want to manage user-organizational unit assignments through the Model-Driven App, so that team membership is maintained for filtering and user context in the Canvas App.

Title: Admin Dashboard
User Story: As an admin, I want a dashboard in the Model-Driven App with overview charts and quick actions, so that I can monitor master data health at a glance.

Title: Security Configuration & Testing
User Story: As an admin, I want security roles properly configured for the Model-Driven App, so that only authorized administrators can access and modify master data.
